inclusion.criterion: Invasive breast cancer or carcinoma in situ
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Breast conserving surgery including or without oncoplastic surgical techniques
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unable to sign an informed consent form
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients above the age of 75 and under the age of 18
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have previously been operated in the same or the contralateral breast, shoulder or arm
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with invasive ductal breast carcinoma and HER2-positive tumor. No other significant medical history.
